alert.note: Alert for Butler; Colfax; Cuming; Madison; Pierce; Platte; Stanton; Wayne (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 1:46AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Madison, southwestern Cuming, southwestern Wayne, Colfax, eastern Platte, southeastern Pierce, northern Butler and Stanton Counties through 215 AM CDT... At 146 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Meadow Grove to 2 miles northwest of Madison to 6 miles south of Creston to 5 miles south of Duncan. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Madison and Creston around 150 AM CDT. Columbus and Leigh around 200 AM CDT. Norfolk, Stanton, Clarkson, Bellwood and Hadar around 205 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Richland, Schuyler, Howells, Hoskins and Octavia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Butler; Colfax; Cuming; Madison; Pierce; Platte; Stanton; Wayne
